recipe.title: Easy chicken dinner
recipe.step: In a flat dish place all ingredients and be sure to coat all of chicken. Marinate for 20 minutes and turn filets over at least once while marinating. Cook on a hot BBQ for about 5-7 minutes each side or until cooked through. Rest for 10 minutes before slicing each filet into 5-6 pieces. Serve with your choice of salad and/or rice dish.
